description:
A young Kage is afraid of the world around him, but finds his courage when faced with a dangerous encounter. Shiina seeks for more strength, but comes to realize that the greatest strength of all is not directed inward, but is found when helping others.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kage no Akogare / Idai na Haha
カゲのあこがれ / 偉大な母
